Title: What Smiles Are For
Writer: Grant Morrison (developed by), Brian Taylor (developed by), Patrick Macmanus (teleplay by), Matthew White (executive story editor), Ken Kristensen (story editor), Grant Morrison (based on the comic by)
Actors: Christopher Meloni, Ritchie Coster, Lili Mirojnick, Medina Senghore
Plot: A former cop turned hitman with some substance problems suddenly finds himself haunted by the relentlessly upbeat presence of a tiny imaginary winged horse.
